hero.title: Find your squad or build one from the ground up
hero.subtitle: From coast-to-coast, tabletop communities are recruiting hosts, storytellers, rules gurus, and volunteers. Discover groups near you and access the resources to help your program thrive.

university.title: University & College Clubs
university.description: Campus programs in every region drive competitive play, intramural leagues, and rookie recruitment. Tap into our season planning templates and officiating support.

community.title: Community & City Leagues
community.description: Adult leagues keep tabletop nights thriving year-round with mixed skill divisions, house tables, and travelling meetup groups. We can help with scheduling, insurance, and grant applications.

youth.title: Youth & School Programs
youth.description: Introduce the sport in classrooms and youth centres with modified rules, inclusive drills, and coach education that scales from introductory sessions to regional jamborees.

connect_locally.title: Club finder & regional hubs
connect_locally.description_1: Our regional coordinators maintain an active directory of university, community, and youth teams. Whether you are relocating, recruiting, or looking for exhibition play, we can link you with the right contacts in seconds.
connect_locally.description_2: Hosting a tournament or wanting to scrimmage? Submit your details and we'll broadcast the request to neighbouring programs and officials across the country.

practice_library.title: Practice & fitness library
practice_library.description: Access progressive training plans, skills videos, and goalkeeper clinics designed by national team staff.

safe_sport.title: Safe sport & safeguarding
safe_sport.description: Stay compliant with national policies covering background checks, injury reporting, and inclusive program design.
